tool_description: Football / soccer real-time data like league table standings, fixtures (matches by league or by date & live matches), match detail (match statistic, line-ups, head-to-head, events, commentaries), news etc.
title: LiveScore Football

api_list.name: /soccer/news-detail
/soccer/league-table
api_list.description: Get current league table standings by `league_code` and `country_code`

required_parameters.name: country_code
required_parameters.description: Country Code including federations. Get from `/soccer/countries` or `/leagues-by-country` endpoint

required_parameters.name: league_code
required_parameters.description: League Code. Get data from `/soccer/leagues-by-country` endpoint

api_list.name: /soccer/leagues-by-country
api_list.description: Get all leagues in a country by `country_code`

required_parameters.name: country_code
required_parameters.description: Country code or Federation code. Get data from `/soccer/countries` endpoint

api_list.name: /soccer/live-matches

optional_parameters.name: timezone_utc
optional_parameters.description: Desired timezone. Get options from `/soccer/timezones` endpoint. Default value `0:00`

api_list.name: /soccer/match-commentaries
/soccer/match-events
api_list.description: Get match events / incidents during a match by `match_id`

api_list.name: /soccer/match-h2h
api_list.description: Get team_1 & team_2 latest matches and Head to latest Head matches by `match_id`

api_list.name: /soccer/match-lineups
api_list.description: Get match line-ups for team_1 and team_2 by `match_id`

api_list.name: /soccer/match-statistics
/soccer/matches-by-date
api_list.description: Get all matches by date. Filtered by `country_code` and `league_code`

optional_parameters.name: league_code
optional_parameters.description: League Code. Get data from `/soccer/leagues-by-country` endpoint

optional_parameters.name: timezone_utc
optional_parameters.description: Desired timezone. Get options from `/soccer/timezones` endpoint. Default value `0:00`

optional_parameters.name: country_code
optional_parameters.description: Country Code including federations. Get from `/soccer/countries` or `/leagues-by-country` endpoint

api_list.name: /soccer/matches-by-league

required_parameters.name: league_code
required_parameters.description: League Code. Get data from `/soccer/leagues-by-country` endpoint

required_parameters.name: country_code
required_parameters.description: Country Code including federations. Get from `/soccer/countries` or `/leagues-by-country` endpoint

optional_parameters.name: timezone_utc
optional_parameters.description: Desired timezone. Get options from `/soccer/timezones` endpoint. Default value `0:00`

optional_parameters.name: round
optional_parameters.description: Round can be number or string e.g: 1|8|1/16 etc.

api_list.name: /soccer/news-list
api_list.description: Get news list from livescore soccer news

api_list.name: /soccer/timezones
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://livescore-football.p.rapidapi.com/soccer/timezones"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "livescore-football.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: /soccer/countries
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://livescore-football.p.rapidapi.com/soccer/countries"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "livescore-football.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
